statement: An enthusiastic, determined and experienced product developer
blurb: Josh has 10 years of experience working in product development in a variety of industries.
He provides a fresh approach to problem solving, generating and communicating ideas impressively.
From building an initial proof of concept, he can take it forward into a fully productionised system, adding value and delighting clients.
As a senior frontend developer, with experience in integration, backend, databases and devops, Josh fits into agile development teams with ease.
